description.zh-cn: YFROBOT 输入型（模块）：按键模块、碰撞检测、磁感应传感器、倾角传感器、红外感应器、震动传感器、热释电传感器、触摸传感器、巡线传感器、旋转编码器
description.en: YFROBOT input Module: button module, collision detection, magnetic induction sensor, inclination sensor, infrared sensor, vibration sensor, pyroelectric sensor, touch sensor, Line patrol sensor, rotary encoder
